beats.label: ZONE 1: Mile 15
beats.narration: Mile 15. The Bottleneck Conspiracy. Singletrack sections create conga lines of walking riders early in the race. You'll have the fitness to ride but nowhere to pass, turning the first hour into a hike-a-bike parade.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

beats.label: ZONE 2: Mile 45
beats.narration: Mile 45. Fire Road Reckoning. Steep dirt climbs hit 29% grade where even your lowest gear becomes useless. This is where riders discover they needed that 40t chainring they didn't buy.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

beats.label: ZONE 3: Mile 85
beats.narration: Mile 85. Creek Crossing Chaos. Multiple water crossings through rocky creek beds that destroy momentum and question your tire pressure choices. Hope you like wet feet with your suffering.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

beats.label: ZONE 4: Mile 110
beats.narration: Mile 110. The Final Punishment. Late-race climbs through chunky gravel and loose rock when your legs are already cooked. This is where the course separates finishers from DNF statistics.
